for _ in xrange(input()):
    events = []
    for __ in xrange(input()):
        start, end = map(int, raw_input().split())
        events.append((end, start))
    events.sort()
    ans = 0
    minstart = -1
    for end, start in events:
        if start > minstart:
            ans += 1
            minstart = end
    print ans
